resources.string: China has the greatest altitude difference on Earth.
Russia occupies a fifth of the world\'s landmass.
Antarctica has over 90% of the world\'s surface water in its ice.
India is the seventh largest country in the world.
Japan has five main islands: Hokkaido, Honshu, Shikoku, Kyushu, and Tsuyaka.
France\'s longest river is the Chardonette, at over 1000 km long.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
Are you sure you want to do this?
